description: River Package - Simulates the effects of flow between surface-water features and groundwater systems

variables.name: COMMENT
variables.description: Optional comment lines at beginning of file.
variables.tooltip: Lines starting with '#' are treated as comments and ignored by MODFLOW.

datasets.description: Maximum number of river cells and output unit

variables.name: Option
variables.description: Optional keyword 'AUXILIARY' followed by auxiliary variable names, and/or 'NOPRINT'.
variables.tooltip: AUXILIARY adds extra data columns. NOPRINT suppresses river list output to listing file.

variables.name: MXACTR
variables.description: Maximum number of river cells active during any stress period.
variables.tooltip: Maximum number of river entries used simultaneously across all stress periods.

variables.name: IRIVCB
variables.description: Unit number for cell-by-cell flow terms. 0=no output, >0=write to this unit.
variables.tooltip: If > 0, river flow terms saved to binary file. If 0, no cell-by-cell output.

variables.name: ITMP
variables.description: Number of river entries for this stress period. <0 reuses previous period data.
variables.tooltip: If > 0, ITMP river entries follow. If 0, no rivers active. If < 0, reuse previous stress period data.

variables.name: NP
variables.description: Number of parameters active in this stress period.
variables.tooltip: Number of named parameters active during this stress period. Typically 0 if not using parameters.

variables.name: Layer
variables.description: Layer number of the river cell (1-based).
variables.tooltip: Layer containing the river reach. 1-based index.

variables.name: Row
variables.description: Row number of the river cell (1-based).
variables.tooltip: Row location of the river reach. 1-based index.

variables.name: Column
variables.description: Column number of the river cell (1-based).
variables.tooltip: Column location of the river reach. 1-based index.

variables.name: Stage
variables.description: Head in the river (river stage) in model length units.
variables.tooltip: Water surface elevation in the river. Flow direction depends on the difference between Stage and the head in the cell.

variables.name: Conductance
variables.tooltip: Riverbed conductance = K_bed * Length * Width / Thickness_bed. Controls the rate of exchange between the river and aquifer.

variables.name: Rbot
variables.description: Elevation of the bottom of the riverbed (L).
variables.tooltip: When head drops below Rbot, the river leaks at a constant rate = Conductance * (Stage - Rbot). This prevents unlimited seepage.
